price: نو خپل رب يې دعا قبوله کړه او د هغوى چلونه يې ترې وګرځول، بې شكه هماغه ډېر پوه اورېدونكى دى.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَجَابَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥ فَصَرَفَ عَنۡهُ كَيۡدَهُنَّۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'tajāba lahu rabbuhu faṣarafa ʿanhu kaydahunna innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
